title: Home country
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Rural families
abstract: A story about family and coming home to country.
description: Julie Mongta/Saunders traces the movement of her family over time, both geographically and generationally. Though scattered, this family have a strong connection, both to each other and the land of their birth, intensified by the sense of 'coming home'.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002170; Pitcha this : Stories from the windy wanderers : Digital Storytelling workshop; Active; 2007
